results.headline: JUDGMENT IN BERLIN (MOVIE)

results.summary_short: American judge tries touchy, true case of Polish-plane hijackers east to west zones. Slipshod drama, none too credible.

results.summary_short: Modern Jack the Ripper copycat, with a twin. Unconvincing and egregiously dull.
